item.title: R4ds-exercises-1
item.description: 统计变换 What is the default geom associated with stat_summary()? How could you rewrite the previous plot to use that geom function instead of the stat function? 统计变换函数stat_summary()的默认几何对象函数是什么？如何使用几何对象
